mapper.select: SELECT `id`, `username`, `password`, `email`, `long_term_usage_count` as longTermUsageCount, `limited_term_usage_count` as limitedTermUsageCount, `limited_term_expire_days` as limitedTermExpireDays, `call_successful` as callSuccessful, `last_modify` as lastModify FROM `account` WHERE `id` = #{id}
